Kontak Kami Pendaftaran

The Arenas of Innovation

This is where your ideas take form and your skills are put to the test. Explore our competition branches, find your passion, and create to make an impact.

Submission Deadline

00Days 00Hours 00Minutes 00Seconds

UI/UX Design

This competition challenges you to design digital solutions that address real-world problems aligned with the SDGs. Focusing on user-centric thinking and impactful execution, you will create interfaces or experiences that directly respond to challenges in food security, education, or clean energy.

Sub-Themes

  • Feeding Fair Future (SDG 2)
  • Learning That Listens (SDG 4)
  • Every Watt Counts (SDG 7)

Assessment Criteria

  • Problem Alignment & SDGs Impact 30%
  • Design Aesthetics 25%
  • Creativity & Innovation 20%
  • UX Flow 25%
Prizepool
Rp5.000.000
Contact Nadia Azaria Register

Digital Poster

This competition is designed to hone your ability to simplify ideas and information, presenting them in a visually compelling way that is easily understood. Create posters that are persuasive, educational, and inspiring, using your creativity to craft powerful visual messages.

Sub-Themes

  • Feeding Fair Future (SDG 2)
  • Learning That Listens (SDG 4)
  • Every Watt Counts (SDG 7)

Assessment Criteria

  • Creativity 35%
  • Theme & Message Alignment 30%
  • Originality 20%
  • Rule Compliance 15%
Prizepool
Rp5.000.000
Contact Earlyanda Laxmi Register

Short Movie

This competition aims to encourage participants from diverse backgrounds to express their unique ideas, vision, and creativity in the form of a short film. Through this competition, you are expected to present a story with a compelling narrative and visuals, ensuring the underlying message is effectively conveyed to the audience.

Sub-Themes

  • Feeding Fair Future (SDG 2)
  • Learning That Listens (SDG 4)
  • Every Watt Counts (SDG 7)

Assessment Criteria

  • Creativity 25%
  • Storytelling 15%
  • Visuals & Cinematography 20%
  • Theme Alignment 20%
  • Language 10%
  • Originality 10%
Prizepool
Rp7.000.000
Contact Amira Hasna Register
